sections.heading: Overview
content:
Ron Gilbert has dedicated his professional career to preventing serious
spinal cord and aquatic injuries. His activities have helped to reduce the
number of serious injuries and improved environmental safety. In his capacity
as an advocate for spinal cord and aquatic injury victims, Gilbert has written
numerous articles that have appeared in both professional and health care
publications. He has lectured throughout the United States.

Gilbert earned his Bachelor of Arts degree from Wittenberg University in
Springfield, Ohio, and his law degree from the University of Michigan.
